message: Let's make a deal. Take this offer, Bob, before inflation eats away at our potential gains!
Alice, my turn.  I'm feeling generous, but let's not let this drag on and lose any more value.
Bob, this is a fair offer considering the inflation. Let's close the deal and avoid further losses.
Alice, we're running out of time! This is my final offer. It's better to take a smaller slice of something than a bigger slice of nothing.
